pullrequest.title: Fix cmake to allow catkin build to work

content.raw:
Looks like it was missing these file dependencies: [8933322](#!/osrf/subt/commits/893332290de400586fc5f5a322724674bc024129?at=tunnel_circuit)

I think that may have been causing a race condition in the build if the build system tries to build the library before generating the headers.

It won't happen for `catkin_make_isolated` or `catkin build` because those enforce the right ordering for the package building, but I think `catkin_make` spoofs itself as building like a single project, so the build order is less defined without making the dependencies explicit.
content.html:
Looks like it was missing these file dependencies: 8933322

I think that may have been causing a race condition in the build if the build system tries to build the library before generating the headers.

It won't happen for catkin_make_isolated or catkin build because those enforce the right ordering for the package building, but I think catkin_make spoofs itself as building like a single project, so the build order is less defined without making the dependencies explicit.
